title: Too many limitations on Fed graph

content.question: Which of the following descriptions is the information on the line graph too limited to support?

choices.label: The more conservative an individual is, the less likely he or she is to believe that the Federal Reserve helps to stabilize the economy.
The more liberal an individual is, the more likely he or she is to believe that the Federal Reserve helps stabilize the economy.
About half of those who identify as very liberal believe that the Federal Reserve helped stabilize the economy.
Most who identify as very conservative believe that the Federal Reserve should be abolished.

content.answer: Most who identify as very conservative believe that the Federal Reserve should be abolished.

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Explain possible limitations of the data provided.
